Blog.post: Welcome to the Very First Edition of Cool Shit! Today's Cool Item: Apple iPod I recently got the 15GB Apple iPod and it works great. When you install it you get itunes. Itunes is a pretty good Jukebox and it does and awesome job of converting file formats... I got about 115 songs on my iPod and it can hold a lot more. The iPod has great sound quality and I recommend getting one. Thats the end of Cool Shit Volume 1 and In the Future check out for my reviews of more Cool Shit!

I recently got an invite to test out the Google Email Service "G-Mail". Its pretty cool. I played around with it a bit its nice how it stores your email. You get a Gigabyte of space so you never need to delete messages. A cool feature is called conversations when you send an email the reply is attatched to the email you sent. It stores all the emails and replies in a thing called a conversation it works good.

Well I am getting a DVD Burner. Its not any fancy DVD Burner only a 4x DVD+R Burner. I wanted a DVD Burner to maybe burn some movies and back-up my data. Now I can back-up my PC to restore it incase of problems which screw it up lol.

After my computer got all messed up from Spyware and Adware I wanted a good anti-spyware + adware program. I think I have found one with SpywareBlaster This program not only gets rid of the spyware you have it also prevents you from getting that junk. A nice feature of the program is you can take a screenshot. It saves all the settings of your system and in case of a problem it can restore your computer to a time when it was working. I recommend downloading this one. Keep your PC safe from adware and spyware.
